title: New: Dose – Moments EP
content:
This new EP from Columbus beat maker Dose is a gloriously ethereal affair, mixing an eclectic variety of influences.

From the Sinead O’Connor sampling The Young & The Restless, to the multi-layered vocal splicing found on All The Beauty And Wonder; it’s a sleekly romantic composition. The sounds are spacious and harmonious, allowing the record to breathe wondrously within it’s vast sonic surroundings. It’s unashamedly ‘chillwave’ inspired, however far more soulful than that dreaded tag may suggest. Check out The Young & The Restless below, and head over to the Dose bandcamp for a free download of Moments.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
